Profile - About Me

Chidambaram Muthappan
  • Chidambaram Muthappan
  • October 02, 1992
  • chidambaram70@gmail.com

    Data Engineering and Data Analytics/Data Science have always been viewed as separate profiles. I have industrial experience and academic knowledge in both the fields which helps me to view projects in an end to end perspective. I can manage and work on the entire data flow right from a record in a transactional db till it becomes an insight. I like to think myself as a Full stack engineer for Data Services.

Experience
  • Big Data Engineer Intern June 2017 - Aug 2017
    Nike, Oregon

  • Refactored and optimized the Nike product recommender Tensor flow model.

  • Won the 48-hour Intern Hackathon for developing an IOS app using AR to bring Nike’s stories and innovations using marker recognition and Unity.

  • Created spark scripts to aggregate and process the clickstream data from Nike.com and build reports.

  • Research Assistant Mar 2017 - June 2017
    UCLA

  • Developed experiments to explore wealth visibility in a setting of dynamic social network interactions using the breadboard framework.

  • Deployed the experiment in AWS and conducted experiments in Amazon Mechanical Turk.

  • I.T Engineer July 2014 - Aug 2016
    Cisco Systems, India

  • · Designed and developed a tool called PDF extractor which creates and extracts information from structurally similar PDFs using Java and Hadoop Map Reduce.

  • Developed spark scripts for parallel processing to create a course recommendation tool.

  • Won Hack IT IV, 2014 (Cisco wide hackathon) for developing crime detection in ATMs.

  • Software Engineer Intern May 2013 - July 2013
    Tata Research, India

  • Coded and deployed an android application called Pustack (interactive book) by integrating several APIs like Google maps, Google books and mediaWiki action.
